title: Greta Van Susteren - Wikipedia
snippet: In 2002, Van Susteren switched to the Fox News Channel after a highly publicized contract-bidding war. Before starting at Fox she also underwent cosmetic surgery that significantly changed her look. She hosted the current affairs show On the Record w/ Greta Van Susteren.

title: Greta Van Susteren: MSNBC Only Network That Ever Tried to Control My Show | Barrett Media
snippet: Greta Van Susteren had previously worked at both CNN and Fox News before joining MSNBC.

title: Greta Van Susteren says MSNBC was only network where bosses ‘tried to tell me what to do’
snippet: Former MSNBC host Greta Van Susteren said the left-leaning Comcast-owned network was the only employer that ever “tried to tell me what to do.”

title: Greta Van Susteren
snippet: While working for Gray TV, Greta simultaneously anchored Voice of America’s weekly television program Plugged In which covered foreign policy, US domestic affairs, and broadcasted worldwide in 48 languages.

title: Greta Van Susteren – USC Center on Communication Leadership and Policy
snippet: While working for Gray TV, Greta simultaneously anchored Voice of America’s weekly television program Plugged In which covered foreign policy, US domestic affairs, and broadcasted worldwide in 48 languages.
